name: UpdateStickyNote
description:
Update a sticky note on a Miro board.

Use this tool to update a sticky note item on a Miro board by providing the necessary data and style properties. Requires 'boards:write' scope. Suitable for instances where users need to modify sticky note contents or appearances remotely.

parameters.name: board_id_for_update
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board where the sticky note update will occur.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

parameters.name: sticky_note_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the sticky note you want to update on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

parameters.name: sticky_note_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing data, style, position, geometry, and parent properties for updating a sticky note, including content, shape, fill color, text alignment, coordinates, dimensions, and parent frame ID.

content.description: The actual text (content) that appears in the sticky note item.

shape.description: Defines the geometric shape of the sticky note and aspect ratio for its dimensions.

data.description: Contains sticky note item data, such as the content or shape of the sticky note.

fillColor.description: Fill color for the sticky note.

textAlign.description: Defines how the sticky note text is horizontally aligned.

textAlignVertical.description: Defines how the sticky note text is vertically aligned.

style.description: Contains information about the style of a sticky note item, such as the fill color or text alignment.

x.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

y.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

position.description: Contains information about the item's position on the board, such as its `x` coordinate, `y` coordinate, and the origin of the `x` and `y` coordinates.

height.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

width.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

geometry.description: Contains geometrical information about the item. You can set either the width or height. You cannot set both the width and height at the same time.

id.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

parent.description: Contains information about the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
